data.name: The Dallen Clicker Developer Commentary
data.detailed_description: Listen to some Insight into the design and development of Dallen Clicker and Dallen Clicker Ultimate they are playing while they are playing it. Dallen Larson goes through the entire history of the Dallen Clicker Franchise.
data.about_the_game: Listen to some Insight into the design and development of Dallen Clicker and Dallen Clicker Ultimate they are playing while they are playing it. Dallen Larson goes through the entire history of the Dallen Clicker Franchise.
data.short_description: The Official Developer Commentary of Dallen Clicker Ultimate. Featuring J.A.Y, Bayleigh, and Sterling.
